::Battera::

She took the bowl and put it in the machine and pressed a few buttons 
and waited for the fruit to appear.
She looked up at Firearm. "Um, thank you for escorting me here." she 
smiled at him and looked to see if the dispenser was done. She took a 
step back and looked around the mess hall.  She smiled at the thought 
of a party or something like that here if the treaties were signed 
and the talks successful. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm shruggs. "As long as they don't open fire I'll be fine."
> 
> He looks at her again, a bit annoyed that the bowl was obscuring 
her somewhat. "But if the open fire, I'd be forced to slag 'em!"
> 
> He stops at the replicator, stepping back so Battera could get to 
it. "Here 
> we are, m'lady."
